mapper.sql: id, waijian, yonghuwaijian, mingcheng, shujuriqi, qujian, leixing, jiliang, shixiao, riqi
mapper.select:
select
from kehuyaowu18s where yonghuwaijian = #{yonghuwaijian} and Shixiao='0' order by shujuriqi
select DATE_FORMAT(max(str_to_date(khyw.shujuriqi,'%Y-%m-%d')),'%Y-%m-%d') as shujuriqi from kehuyaowu18s khyw where khyw.Yonghuwaijian=#{waijian}

select
from kehuyaowu18s khyw where khyw.Yonghuwaijian=#{waijian} and Shixiao='0' order by khyw.shujuriqi
mapper.insert: insert into kehuyaowu18s (id, waijian, yonghuwaijian, mingcheng, shujuriqi, qujian, leixing, jiliang, shixiao, riqi) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{waijian,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yonghuwaijian,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shujuriqi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qujian,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leixing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jiliang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shixiao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{riqi,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,
waijian,

mapper.update:
update kehuyaowu18s
waijian = #{waijian,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
yonghuwaijian = #{yonghuwaijian,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mingcheng = #{mingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shujuriqi = #{shujuriqi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qujian = #{qujian,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
leixing = #{leixing,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jiliang = #{jiliang,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shixiao = #{shixiao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
riqi = #{riqi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update kehuyaowu18s set waijian = #{waijian,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yonghuwaijian = #{yonghuwaijian,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mingcheng = #{mingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shujuriqi = #{shujuriqi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qujian = #{qujian,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, leixing = #{leixing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jiliang = #{jiliang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shixiao = #{shixiao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, riqi = #{riqi,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
